messages.text:
You'll be able to move your pole
      more smoothly if you bring the Wii
      Remote closer to the Sensor Bar.

Move the cursor over the
cue ball and press .
Hold down  and move the cursor to change your aim. Press  to check the table.

Hold down  and
pull the Wii Remote
straight back.

Release  as you
push the Wii Remote
straight forward.
Press  to place the cue ball wherever you want.

The cue ball failed to hit
the target ball first.

The cue ball fell
into the pocket.

The cue ball missed
the target ball.

You shot a ball
off the table.
Move your Wii Remote closer to the Sensor Bar for better cue control.
Move the Wii Remote to zoom!

Tilt the Wii Remote on its side
so that  is on your left.
Raise the Wii Remote quickly to jump.

Tilt the Wii Remote forward to run,
and tilt it back to slow down.

Shoot down the
targets by aiming the
Wii Remote at the
screen. Fire with .
Combo 5 or more
shots for a bonus!

Pick out the right
faces from the
crowd. Aim with
the Wii Remote,
and press  to
select.

Move the paddle to
return the ball. Aim
the Wii Remote at
the screen to move
the paddle. How many
times can you rally?

Twist the Wii
Remote to spin the
Mii left and right.
Switch poses by
pressing  or .

Hit the puck into
your opponent's
goal with the Wii
Remote. Twist the
Wii Remote left and
right to rotate.

Strike the cue ball
with the Wii Remote.
Aim for the ball with
the cursor over it.
How many shots will it
take to sink them all?

Move the Wii Remote
forward, back, up,
down, left, and right
to move the rod.
When you get a
nibble, pull back!

Turn the Wii Remote
so that  is on the
left. Tilt forward to
run, back to slow,
and sideways to turn.
Raise it to jump.

Wii Remote: Aim
㌧ or : Steer tank
: Fire
: Drop a mine

Shoot down the
targets by aiming the
Wii Remote at the
screen. Fire with .
Combo 5 or more
shots for a bonus!

Pick the right faces
from the crowd. Aim
with the Wii Remote,
and press  to
select. Press  for
a reminder.

Move the paddle to
return the ball.
The first player to
11 wins. Change
where it lands by
moving the paddle.

Twist the Wii
Remote to spin the
Mii left and right.
Switch poses by
pressing  or .

Hit the puck into
your opponent's
goal with the Wii
Remote. Twist the
Wii Remote left and
right to rotate.

Strike the cue ball
with the Wii Remote.
Aim for the ball with
the cursor over it.
Sink a ball to earn
that many points.

Move the Wii Remote
forward, back, up,
down, left, and right
to move the rod.
When you get a
nibble, pull back!

Turn the Wii Remote
so that  is on the
left. Tilt forward to
run, back to slow,
and sideways to turn.
Raise it to jump.

Wii Remote: Aim
㌧ or : Steer tank
: Fire
: Drop a mine
Return to Select Players screen?{ WINDOW_DEFAULT_CURSOR 01 00 }

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Welcome to Wii Play!

   This game will teach you
   everything you need to know
   about the Wii Remote.
   In stage one, you'll use the Wii
   Remote to shoot targets.

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Stage two is now open!

 In stage two, you'll use the Wii
 Remote to pick the correct Mii out
 of the crowd. You'll see a lot of
 Miis out there--maybe even a few
 that you've created yourself!

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Stage three is now open!

 So, you've gotten used to using
 the Wii Remote as a pointer, have
 you? The next stage will help
 improve your pointing speed and
 accuracy.

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Stage four is now open!

  Pointing directly at the screen
  is only one of the many uses for
  the Wii Remote. In the next
  stage, you'll have to twist the
  Wii Remote, too!

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Stage five is now open!

  Think you're getting the hang of
  twisting the Wii Remote? Then
  show off your new skills in a
  little match of Laser Hockey!

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Stage six is now open!

 This time, move the Wii Remote
 closer to the TV and then farther
 away for some 3-D movement.
 For the best results, sit so that
 you're centered with the TV.

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Stage seven is now open!

 Move the Wii Remote forward,
 back, left, and right to move the
 fishing pole. It might seem odd at
 first, but just relax, take your
 time, and enjoy yourself!

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Stage eight is now open!

  You've come a long way, haven't
  you? Let's change things up a
  little by holding the Wii Remote
  sideways for this next game!

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }The final stage is now open!

 This might seem complex, but
 you've done great so far! You
 can use the Nunchuk to play
 this game (or just use the Wii
 Remote by itself if you like).

{ WINDOW_ALIGN 00 00 }Congratulations!

 You are now a Wii Remote master!
 You've just gotten a small taste
 of what the Wii Remote can do.
 Now, challenge a friend, or try
 to earn all the gold medals!
Aim the Wii Remote at the screen.
P1: Aim the Wii Remote at the screen.
P2: Aim the Wii Remote at the screen.

The following player has been
added to your Wii Play player
list: { VAR_1 }

If you erase this Mii from the
Mii Channel, it will be also
deleted from your Wii Play
player list, so please be
careful.

Congratulations!
{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in all of the
minigames.

You're getting a hang of the
Wii Remote. Keep it up!

Congratulations!
{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in all of the
minigames.

You've got a good handle on
using the Wii Remote. You've
earned bragging rights, so go
on and tell all your friends!

Congratulations!
{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in all of the
minigames.

Excellent! You really are a
Wii Remote master now!

Congratulations!
{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in all of the
minigames.

You've gone beyond mere master
now... It's like you and your
Wii Remote are one! Impressive!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in
Shooting Range. That makes
you a novice sharpshooter!

Here's a tip: Don't just blast
everything that moves. Instead,
try to chain five or more shots.
It's a great way to improve
your score--and your skills!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Shooting
Range. That makes you a
master sharpshooter!

Here's a tip: The more targets
you hit in Level 2, the more
targets will fly out! This is
your chance to earn a ton of
points. Use it wisely.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Shooting
Range. That makes you a
sharpshooting wiz!

Here's a tip: Focus on accuracy
instead of on peppering targets
with shots. You'll earn more
points for shots hit in a row.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Shooting
Range. That makes you an
unrivaled sharpshooter!

You don't need any more advice.
However, see how well you can
score with two Wii Remotes!
Impress your friends and
intimidate your enemies!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Find Mii.
You've got good eyes!

Here's a tip: The more Miis
you make in the Mii Channel,
the more familiar the faces
here will be. Familiar faces
might make things easier...

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Find Mii.
You've got sharp eyes!

Here's a tip: Use your sharp
eyes in the real world to find
lost keys and spare change!
Bus fare is never far away!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Find Mii.
You've got eagle eyes!

You have good observation skills
and a great memory...or maybe
you're just good at remembering
faces.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Find
Mii. Are you...clairvoyant?

We've got nothing but praise
for you...but you already knew
that, didn't you?

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Table
Tennis. You've got the makings
of a master player!

Here's a tip: The trick to
improving your game is to
keep your paddle movements
small.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Table
Tennis. You're the team captain!

You've improved quite a bit.
Now, work on your reaction
time. With a little focus,
100 rallies will be no problem
at all!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Table
Tennis. You're a table-tennis
terror!

Remember back when 100 rallies
seemed impossible? Now, you
can probably beat that in your
sleep!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Table
Tennis. You're a table-tennis
wizard!

You need no more advice.
Now, try to rally 999 times!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Pose Mii.
You are now an apprentice Mii
poser.

Just relax and pop those
bubbles one at a time.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Pose Mii.
You are now a true Mii poser.

Learning to switch poses quickly
is the key to improvement.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Pose Mii.
You are now a master poser.

The only way to improve is to
master using both the A and B
Buttons to change your poses.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Pose Mii.
You are now a Mii poser par
excellence.

Show off your posing skills to
your friends, and be the envy
of all who behold you!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Laser
Hockey. This makes you a
member of the team!

Here's a tip: Try to catch your
opponent off guard by
ricocheting the puck off
the wall.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Laser
Hockey. This makes you captain
of the team!

Here's a tip: The back of the
paddle bounces the puck less
than the front does. Make the
puck travel faster by using the
ends of the paddle.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Laser
Hockey. This makes you
manager of the team!

Here's a tip: Press the A and B
Buttons together during the
countdown to change the
paddle's shape!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Laser
Hockey. This makes you the
owner of the team!

You have nothing more to learn!
Just remember to wear your
mouth guard--hockey can get
rough...even Laser Hockey!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Billiards.
You're a pool shark in training!

Here's a tip: Strike near the
bottom of the cue ball to give
it backspin. Hit it near the
top to give it topspin.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Billiards.
You're a pool shark now!

Here's a tip: Move the cursor
while holding the B Button to
change where you aim. You
can jump the ball by aiming
and hitting from the top.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Billiards.
You're not just a pool shark!
You're a great white!

Here's a tip: Strike the cue ball
on its left or right side to
give it some spin. Try this
when your target is at a tricky
angle.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Billiards.
You eat pool sharks for
breakfast!

You don't need any more advice.
Just go show off for your
friends!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Fishing.
You're a vacation fisher, aren't
you?

Here's a tip: Small fries will
just swim away if you don't
reel them in. They'll disappear
from the pond if you ignore
them.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Fishing.
You're a fishing fanatic!

Here's a tip: The red touchy
fish swim away if you move
the hook behind them. Move
the hook toward their heads.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Fishing.
You're a master angler!

If you want to improve, try
catching all the bonus fish.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Fishing.
Who's king of the pond now!?

You don't need any more advice.
No fish can escape your hook!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Charge!
That makes you a tenderfoot!

Here's a tip: The scarecrow
kings (the ones with the crowns)
are worth more points. Be sure
you don't leave a single one
standing!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Charge!
You're a regular rodeo clown!

Here's a tip: When you see a
group of scarecrows all in a
row, knock them all down to
earn bonus points.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Charge!
You're an honest-to-goodness
cowpoke, aren't you?

Here's a tip: Tilt the Wii
Remote forward right when you
see the word Start to get an
extra boost of speed out of
the gate.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Charge!
I reckon you fancy yourself a
regular bronco buster, huh?

You don't need any more advice.
Now, it's time to show off for
your friends!

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a bronze medal in Tanks!
You've been promoted to private,
first class!

Here's a tip: You can destroy
certain walls with a mine. Use
this to create a shortcut or an
escape route.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a silver medal in Tanks!
You've been promoted to
sergeant!

Here's a tip: Some enemies can't
dodge your shells very well, and
some drive right over mines.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a gold medal in Tanks!
You've been promoted to
general!

Outstanding battle results!
You will, no doubt, receive more
missions in the future.

{ VAR_1 } has earned
a platinum medal in Tanks!
You've been promoted to five-
star general! Sir! Impressive
work, sir!

You have superior judgment,
focus, and fighting skills, sir!
You might have what it takes
to clear Mission 100, sir!
